reviewText: Great finding this, video quality is do much better than the old vhs tapes.. German menus but it does have English audio option, but has German subtitles I could not disable.. I was able to rip the English language version and it did not have the subtitles.. Video shows zone c on package, but my ps4 (us version) played them no problem.

Omg! I  My FF box set!!! It brings back a lot of memories:)
Special features of the actors & actresses chatting about the series.
Sadly Michelle Gallagher (Georgina) passed away quite sometime now

hello, everybody,

i write to all cff lovers, because in germany are very great thrilling
seven cff-movies with english language
for buying there in amazon.de and ebay.de, too:
Five on a Treasure Island (Die Sache mit der Schatzinsel)
Five Clues to Fortune (Geheimsache fnf)
Valley of the Kings (Im Tal der Knige)
Beware of the Dog (Achtung: Bissiger Hund)
The Carringford School Mystery (Die Halskette)
The Young Jacobites (Die jungen Jakobiter)
the secret in the mine (das geheimnis der mine)
